Cause Affliction: Slow
 
(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This spell will slow down a small group of enemies. The slowed units will require twice as long time to move, attack or cast spells. The effect will last for the entire battle.
Slow 50%, Att -2, Def -2.
